group_1.textRight: Hotaru... You're not Hotaru anymore...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? What?

group_1.textRight: UwaaAAAH...!

group_1.textLeft: H-huh...? I made you cry again...?
Hey...

group_1.textRight: Sorry...I don't get it...@I don't have any siblings...
I don't have any little sisters either...
Ugh...

group_1.textLeft: Umm...want some candy...?

group_1.textRight: Don't treat me like a kid...!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry...

group_1.textRight: Umm... I can take over for your class duties today...

group_1.textLeft: Thanks.
...How about we change locations?@Let's find an empty classroom...
(She stopped crying...but she's still on guard...)

group_1.textRight: Where'd you take the real Hotaru?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm the real Hotaru, though.

group_1.textRight: Liar.
Hotaru is a lazy, zero-motivation girl@who does nothing but sleep.
You wake up on your own, you don't sleep in class,@and you got top grades on your tests.
You're obviously a fake.

group_1.textLeft: ...What can I say? I can't counter that.

group_1.textRight: So then you ARE a fake...!
Twins? Split personality...?@Or were you abducted by aliens?

group_1.textLeft: ...I knew some weird rumors were going around,@but they were that bad...?
Uh～... I'm the real Hotaru Yura...the real deal.
I'm serious here... I just wanted you to have a higher opinion of me is all...
So I put some effort in...

group_1.textRight: Me?

group_1.textLeft: I've been thinking I've been abandoned@because I'm such a useless slacker...
And you got mad at me because I have no discipline,@right...?
...Am I wrong?

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:305701:cheek_0][chara:305701:motion_300][chara:305701:lipSynch_1]You're wrong.
What made me angry was...
Even though you were being made fun of,@you were always smiling...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: And...
Because you're so lazy, unwilling to do anything,@and only have sleeping on your mind...
...Because you're always sleeping...@Just like that bunny...
I'm scared...that one day, you...
You're going to fall asleep,@and never wake up again...

group_1.textLeft: Bunny...?
Mm? ...hmmm...?@What do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Akari?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:305701:lipSynch_1]The bunny... She died...

group_1.textRight: Oh dear... The little one you were taking care of@at school?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
I gave her the food, but she wouldn't move.
At first I thought that...she was just sleeping, but...
She wasn't...breathing...

group_1.textRight: Poor dear...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. I thought she was just sleeping,@because she sleeps all the time...
I didn't even realize right away...that she died...@*Sniffle*...

group_1.textRight: ...I see.@That...must have broken your heart...

group_1.textLeft: ...*Sniffle*...Ugh...

group_1.textRight: ...Since I met you right after that...
I can't help but associate that baby with you@ever since I found you by the hutch.
And she also loved to sleep more than to play or eat,@and...*sniffle*...
*Sniffle*...*sniffle*...
And Hotaru...@You don't even care about yourself...
Someday...you're also going to fall asleep@and you might never wake up...
I worry about you...
Sooner or later...just like that baby,@I'm going to lose you too...!

group_1.textLeft: (It's not that I don't care about myself, but...)
(Mm～... I kinda get her...)
